name: P6s - Cachexia 2 practice
description:
practice for a raid mechanic in FF14

Yellow square - correct square to be in for mechanic

Green square - the 4 safe spots around her just for a reference

r - restarts the game, controls are the same as the devour practice I did in the past.

I notice that off the first run the game turns black screen for some reason, if you reload the game it shouldn't do it again.

_________________________________

I will continue to add mechanic sims on here if it becomes popular (for both FF and WoW)
